channel.title: Yan-Hao Wang on LoongBSD Group Messages
channel.description: Recent content in Yan-Hao Wang on LoongBSD Group Messages

item.title: Leveraging the Power of ChatGPT and Vector Databases in the FreeBSD Expert System
item.description: This paper aims to elucidate the process entailed in crafting a FreeBSD expert system, leveraging the LLM model ChatGPT in tandem with vector databases Furthermore, the design is adaptable to any open-source LLM model.
